comments: The worst professor i have ever had at Pima.He doesn\'t know the material well, so he lectures while reading a book, or uses excel and makes it hard to learn.I got an A in class, but i thought that i would fail.You need to be in class every day and do all the assignments with tutors, friends,etc.
Tends to ramble a lot, and his homeworks are not easy, but if you go to class you will do fine. Realistic examples.

his method of teaching is horrible, he uses excel and shows how he\'s doing things, but once you have to come up with net income or anything else you\'re trying to find he uses formulas which you cannot see unless he click on the cell. stupid grading, he talks about grading but his grading is unethical... i dont recommend him at all...

this teacher is the worst teacher ive ever had. he took 15 points out of 25 because i didn\'t indent a paragraph. he is smart he just doesn\'t know how to teach he is more worried about there being a bell curve in grades than being fair in his grading.

He is qualified for the job, but he doesn\'t know how to teach. His examples ramble on to the point that the purpose of the example is unclear. The grading is based off of what he wants, not what is written, so be very aware of that. Don\'t expect an easy A.

Dinkel is good if you come to class ready to learn. do not take this teacher if you are not ready to come to class having already read the chapter. He curves assignments so the class average is 75 (if it is lower). He offers extra points on tests. I thought i had a B in the class... studied for the final. ended with an A. DONT CHEAT/DONT COPY PEERS

Professor is fairly difficult. However, is willing to help when he can. His time is somewhat limited due to owning his own business. Come to class having read the lecture notes already. He is extremely knowledgeable about the subject and is able to answer any questions you might have. DO NOT CHEAT whatever you do!

The class is extremely hard and he does the best he can to explain it in as many ways as possible. If you go to class and ask questions, you\'ll be okay. He curves if necessary on all assignments and is pretty fair in grading. Don\'t expect an A unless you work for it. Don\'t cheat and you won\'t have a problem with him.
Does everything he can to work AGAINST the students...cares WAAAAY too much about himself to even notice if a student has a problem/needs help.
WORST teacher i have ever had. if you can teach yourself accounting from the text you\'ll be fine, but if you expect to learn anything from him, find a different teacher.
